entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
